# North by Northeast Journeys - LLM Context File

## Project Overview
**Name:** North by Northeast Journeys (NBNE)
**URL:** https://nnejourneys.com/
**Type:** Travel & Tourism Website
**Focus:** Adventure, nature, and culture tours in Northeast India
**Tech Stack:** Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Velite CMS

## Business Description
North by Northeast Journeys specializes in adventure, nature, and culture tours across Northeast India, covering regions including:
- Assam
- Arunachal Pradesh
- Meghalaya
- Nagaland
- Sikkim

The company offers various tour types:
- **Active Holidays:** Cycling, trekking, multi-activity, motorcycle tours
- **Leisure Holidays:** Comfort tours, offbeat experiences, wildlife tours, road trips
- **Cultural Tours:** Cultural immersion experiences in Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, and Nagaland
- **Family Holidays:** Family-friendly tour packages
- **Fixed Departures:** Scheduled group tours

## Technical Architecture

### Framework & Core Technologies
- **Next.js 16** with App Router
- **React 19** with TypeScript
- **Tailwind CSS** for styling
- **Velite** for content management (MDX-based CMS)
- **Cloudflare R2** for image storage and CDN
- **Google Tag Manager** for analytics
- **Service Worker** for PWA functionality

### Project Structure
```
/app                    # Next.js app directory (routes)
  /aboutus             # About us pages
  /actions             # Server actions (forms)
  /contact             # Contact page
  /posts               # Blog/insights
  /tours               # Tour listings & detail pages
    /[...slug]         # Dynamic tour detail pages
    /departures        # Fixed departure tours
/components            # React components
  /emails              # Email templates (React Email)
  /layout              # Header, footer, navigation
    /navbar            # Top navigation & menu
    /footer            # Footer components
  /page-sections       # Homepage sections
  /posts               # Blog components
  /styledcomps         # Reusable styled components
  /tours               # Tour-related components
    /tours-list        # Tour listing components
    /tours-page        # Tour detail page components
  /ui                  # Shadcn UI components
/content               # MDX content files
  /posts               # Blog posts
  /tours               # Tour content
/lib                   # Utility functions & configs
/public                # Static assets
```

### Key Features

#### Content Management
- **Velite CMS:** MDX-based content system for tours and blog posts
- Dynamic content transformation with computed fields
- R2 gallery integration with automatic image processing
- Support for tour metadata: highlights, inclusions, exclusions, FAQs, itineraries

#### Image Management
- Cloudflare R2 bucket: `pub-3d943afeed9643318d31712e02ebf613.r2.dev`
- Next.js Image optimization with AVIF/WebP formats
- PhotoSwipe integration for image galleries
- Lazy loading with blur placeholders

#### UI Components
- **Shadcn UI** components library
- Custom components:
  - `Container`: Animated container with scroll-based reveal
  - `VideoPlayer`: Media-chrome based video player
  - `YouTubeVideo`: YouTube embed with custom poster
  - Tour cards, galleries, forms
- **Framer Motion** for animations (replaced with CSS transitions in some areas)

#### Forms & Actions
- React Hook Form with Zod validation
- Server actions for:
  - Tour enquiry forms
  - Contact forms
- Resend integration for email notifications

#### SEO & Schema
- Comprehensive structured data:
  - Organization schema
  - Website schema
  - Tour schema (TouristTrip)
  - Breadcrumb schema
- Dynamic metadata generation
- XML sitemap
- Robots.txt

### Tour Data Structure
Tours are stored as MDX files in `/content/tours/` with frontmatter:
```yaml
title: Tour title
subtitle: Short description
days: "X days"
category: active|leisure|culture|departures
tourtype: cycling|trekking|motorcycle|wildlife|etc.
tags: [tag1, tag2]
weight: number (for sorting)
keywords: SEO keywords
overview: [{label, icon, data}]
highlights: [string array]
inclusions: [string array]
exclusions: [string array]
faq: [{title, text}]
galleryFolder: path/to/gallery
video: YouTube URL
```

### Navigation Structure
**Main Menu:**
- Home
- Tours (with category filters: Active, Leisure, Culture)
- Departures
- About Us (Team, Insights)
- Contact

**Tour Categories:**
- Active: cycling, trekking, multi-activity, motorcycle, family
- Leisure: comfort, offbeat, wildlife, roadtrip
- Culture: arunachal, assam, nagaland

### Styling & Theme
- **Fonts:** Montserrat, Open Sans (Google Fonts)
- **Theme:** Light/dark mode support via next-themes
- **Colors:** Custom theme with Tailwind CSS
- **Animations:**
  - Scroll-based reveals using IntersectionObserver
  - Slide-up animations on page sections
  - Carousel/slider components with Embla

### Performance Optimizations
- Image optimization (AVIF, WebP)
- Font subsetting and display:swap
- Resource preconnecting to R2 CDN
- Static generation for tours and posts
- Turbopack for development
- Service worker caching
- Long-term caching headers (1 year)

### Third-Party Integrations
- **Media Chrome:** Video player controls
- **PhotoSwipe:** Image lightbox gallery
- **Embla Carousel:** Tour sliders
- **Resend:** Transactional emails
- **React Email:** Email templates
- **Sonner:** Toast notifications

## Common Development Tasks

### Adding a New Tour
1. Create MDX file in `/content/tours/`
2. Add frontmatter with required fields
3. Upload images to R2 bucket
4. Add gallery folder path
5. Write tour content in MDX
6. Build to generate static pages

### Modifying Tour Layout
- Tour card: `/components/tours/tours-list/tour-card.tsx`
- Tour detail page: `/app/tours/[...slug]/page.tsx`
- Tour sections: `/components/tours/tours-page/`

### Styling Changes
- Global styles: `/app/globals.css`
- Tailwind config: `/tailwind.config.ts`
- Theme colors: In Tailwind config and CSS variables

### Content Updates
- Blog posts: `/content/posts/*.mdx`
- Tours: `/content/tours/*.mdx`
- Run `npm run content` to rebuild content

## Important Notes
- The site uses Cloudflare for hosting
- Images must be uploaded to R2 bucket before referencing
- All tours require proper schema markup for SEO
- The staggered list animation was removed in favor of simple Container animations
- MediaController components have suppressHydrationWarning due to SSR issues

## Environment Variables
- `NEXT_PUBLIC_GTM_ID`: Google Tag Manager ID
- `NEXT_PUBLIC_R2_BUCKET_URL`: R2 bucket URL
- Email service credentials for Resend

## Build & Deployment
```bash
npm run dev          # Development with Turbopack
npm run build        # Production build
npm run start        # Start production server
npm run content      # Rebuild Velite content
```

## Key Files for Modifications
- Site config: `/lib/constants.ts`
- Schemas: `/lib/schemas.ts`
- Content config: `/velite.config.ts`
- Next.js config: `/next.config.mjs`
- Layout: `/app/layout.tsx`
- Homepage: `/app/page.tsx`
- Tours page: `/app/tours/page.tsx`
